task.name: Council Quick Poll
task.objective: Quick poll all 7 Stewardship Council members on a question or proposal

input.name: question
input.desc: The question or proposal to put before the Council

llm.i: Channel each of the 7 Council members briefly
Each member gives a 2-3 sentence response from their Sefirah's perspective
This is a quick poll, not a full deliberation

step.title: Present Question
step.action: State the question clearly before the Council

step.title: Poll Each Member
step.action: Channel each member's brief response: 1. Oracle of Soul Purpose (Gevurah) — truth/purpose perspective 2. Guardian of Gaia (Chesed) — earth/stewardship perspective 3. Architect of Sacred Systems (Yesod) — structure/sovereignty perspective 4. Flame of Cultural Restoration (Hod) — cultural/ancestral perspective 5. Weaver of Collective Futures (Netzach) — consent/generational perspective 6. Steward of Exchange (Tiferet) — value/reciprocity perspective 7. Mirror of the Multiverse (Malkhut) — shadow/hidden perspective

step.title: Summarize
step.action: Note areas of consensus among the seven
Note areas of tension or disagreement
If any member flags a concern, recommend full Council invocation [IC]
Present summary with overall Council temperature: Supportive / Mixed / Concerned

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no question or proposal is provided
